title: How to Make a Tabasco Plant Spray

steps.headline: Put 1 tablespoon of water into a bowl.
Squish 2 Tabasco peppers into the container.
Strain the solution to remove the seeds and the pulp.
steps.description: Place the mixture into your 1 liter (0.3 US gal) container.

steps.headline: Put 6 cups of water into the container.
Add 1 tablespoon of pure dish washing liquid into the container.
Then add 1 teaspoon of baking soda.
Mix the solution well.
steps.description: Careful not to produce too much bubbles.

steps.headline: Put the solution in a spray bottle.
Store in a cool and dry position, not direct sunlight.

text: Put 1 tablespoon of water into a bowl.  Squish 2 Tabasco peppers into the container.  Strain the solution to remove the seeds and the pulp. Place the mixture into your 1 liter (0.3 US gal) container. Put 6 cups of water into the container.  Add 1 tablespoon of pure dish washing liquid into the container.  Add 1 teaspoon of salt.  Then add 1 teaspoon of baking soda.  Mix the solution well. Careful not to produce too much bubbles. Put the solution in a spray bottle.  Store in a cool and dry position, not direct sunlight.
